q: Did David Letterman just pull a Regis and announce his retirement last night? Maybe! During a chat with Howard Stern the shock jock asked the late night host how much longer are you doing this, really? To which David Letterman responded "I don't know. Maybe two more years?" wondering if that meant David Letterman was thinking about retirement. Well... Rob Burnett the CEO of Worldwide Pants and executive producer of Late Show- says: Don't count on it. Burnett downplays rumors that David Letterman will retire in 2013 after his contract expires in 2012, he himself says he has no idea when the talk show host plans retire."

staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
